title: Potato moussaka
ingredients: ['1kg potatoes, peeled and sliced into 5mm rounds', '3 tbsp vegetable oil', '2 large onions, finely chopped', '150ml dry white wine or vegetable stock', '700g jar passata', '1 tsp sugar', '1/2 tsp ground nutmeg', '2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley or 1 tbsp chopped fresh rosemary', '20 black olives, stoned and chopped', '4 tbsp fresh breadcrumbs', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'sprig of fresh parsley or rosemary to garnish (optional)']
